entry.title: Hello everyone!
entry.content:
It’s been a year or so since I first thought about starting a blog. And then there was work, family and more work, and time flew by without me even noticing. Then a friend told me about Octopress, so I checked it out.

Hmm… Blogging framework for hackers, Ruby, Heroku, markup and one-line deloyment? Sounds great!

In less than an hour I had cloned Octopress, bought my domain, linked it to Heroku and deployed my beautifully empty blog. Yay! This is blogging for hackers.
